record.title: Prediction of postpartum depression in women: development and validation of multiple machine learning models.
record.subjects: Depression, Postpartum diagnosis ; Machine Learning ; Humans ; Female ; Adult ; Pregnancy ; Risk Factors ; Reproducibility of Results ; Risk Assessment ; Algorithms ; Young Adult ; Logistic Models ; Neural Networks, Computer
record.abstract: Declarations. Ethics approval and consent to participate: Ethical approval for the study was obtained from the medical ethics committee of Hebei Medical University (MREC ID No: 2020093) and Shijiazhuang Obstetrics and Gynecology Hospital (MREC ID No: 20200024) following the principles of the Declaration of Helsinki. Consent for publication: Not applicable. Competing interests: The authors have no conflicts of interest to disclose.
record.contributors: Qi, Weijing ; Wang, Yongjian ; Wang, Yipeng ; Huang, Sha ; Li, Cong ; Jin, Haoyu ; Zuo, Jinfan ; Cui, Xuefei ; Wei, Ziqi ; Guo, Qing ; Hu, Jie
